name: hyperactiv
description: Super small observable & reactive objects library.

scripts.start: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build: rollup -c config/rollup.config.js && npm run build:handlers && npm run build:react && npm run build:classes && npm run build:websocket
scripts.build:test: rollup -c config/rollup.config.js -o ./dist/hyperactiv.map.js -m inline && rollup -c config/rollup.handlers.config.js -o ./handlers/handlers.map.js -m inline && rollup -c config/rollup.classes.config.js -o ./classes/classes.map.js -m inline && rollup -c config/rollup.websocket.config.js -o ./websocket/websocket.map.js -m inline

author: Julien Elbaz
